merge_before_transcript:
pete: Listen, can you promise me that you won’t tell her though?
phoebe: Absolutely, oh I promise. Tell her what?
pete: Thanks a lot.
phoebe: No I’m serious. I mean I’m intuitive, but my memory sucks.
chandler_transcript: Okay, but this is the last time. (singing) With a chick-chick here, and a chick-chick there. Here a chick, there a chick, everywhere a chick-chick-(Joey enters)-chickeeeen.
